Default: It's a scarf with mysterious power that restore a bit of health depending on Endurance when receiving damage.
Probably a bicycler's helmet. It's certainly used, but it should still offer a little protection.
A helmet with a cracked face shield. It'll still help, especially if anything aims for the eyes.
A helmet made from mutant bones and hide gathered underground.
A newly-made headpiece that protects as much of the wearer's head from all angles.
Headwear with some extra-protective features, including a computerized visor. It looks like something from a video game.
This form-fitting helmet is hard enough to make headbutting monsters a real option. Judith installed some impressive tech in this one.
A simple helmet worn by the miners on Titan.
A lightweight helmet crafted from a wolf's skull, reinforced with a metallic frame to withstand impact. You'll look damn cool wearing this.
Convenient sportswear made by TECC. It's a staple outfit for the people in the camp.
A set of old body armor. It's old but better than nothing.
A decent set of armor that provides suitable protection from basic attacks. Not designed to face monsters, though.
A set of body armor made of mutant bones and hide. It smells horrible, but provides adequate protection.
Improved armor that offers extra protection from bullets and monster claws, so you can fight the good fight.
Standard armor with nonstandard additions that boggle the mind. Hopefully, they're helpful and not dangerous.
An advanced set of armor that could stop a bulldozer, and you'll feel indestructible while wearing it.
A basic miner's uniform. Offers minor protection against cold and heat.
Wearing this medical coat tells everyone you're a doctor. Get ready to deal with a lot of blood.
The uniform of choice for generator workers. It has extra pockets and loops for your tools.
Engineers build and fix machines. This uniform comes with your sleeve already rolled up to save time.
Made from lightweight material to maximize reaction speed, pilots wearing the proper uniform always feel like flying.
Working in Alp's Pub can ruin your clothes. For protection, this full-length apron does the trick.
Scientists are the heart of Titan's settlement. The uniform includes a striking coat and lots of pockets to hold items you scavenge.
This padded uniform allows soldiers to carry lots of ammo and effectively hide in the dark. Plus, you'll look like a ninja.
Working in the Supply Depot means lifting and handling cargo, but the uniform is pretty casual.
Plumbers aren't known for their fashion appeal, but at least Cristhyan wears suspenders to keep his pants up.
A simple outfit with a leather coat and comfortable pants. Earl knows how to dress for sure!
For an outfit worn by such a beauty, this suit is just a basic sweater and slacks. True beauty is on the inside anyway, right?
This combination of white, yellow, and blue makes the perfect suit for those who enjoy bright colors.
If you want to think like a genius, you should dress like a genius. Judith approved!
You can't get better than Mr. Lao's striped trench coat if you want fashionable comfort.
Martin's suave combination of silk and leather comes from decades of dressing to impress. Time for you to look just as slick.
The perfect clothes to wear when you're not partying. The coat keeps you warm and is stain-resistant.
Protecting your clothes is crucial when you have to handle dirt and chemicals. Rana knows how to dress for the job.
A uniform for someone who takes their job seriously. Look professional and impress others with this sleek suit.
Miners don't need heavy equipment when not underground. Sometimes, it's better just to wear regular clothes like Tau does.
This suit includes a basic sweater and khakis. Temir is a simple man, after all.
Blue is Ursula's favorite color. If you share this sentiment, then show that off with this bright sweater.
One might assume Wirat would wear robes, but he forgot to pack them. Denim is his second choice, though.
This bright yellow suit dramatically increases resistance to Acid Damage. Not stylish, but you'll live.
Old fashioned firefighters used to wear this suit. It greatly increases resistance to Burn Damage.
To become the wolf, one must revere the wolf. Wearing a wolf's skin can bring you closer to your wild nature.
A pair of old but usable military-grade gloves.
A newer pair of military-grade gloves to protect delicate fingers. They look cool too!
A set of armored gloves made from a combination of underground mutant bones and hide.
Gloves fit with extra protection and improved weapon gripping power.
Gloves with experimental features. The fingers are stiff, but they are obviously well-protected.
A pair of high-tech, form-fitting gauntlets that improve throwing and work cohesively with Judith's other inventions.
Essential safety gloves for miners. Good grips won't slip!
These gloves will help procure a heat sink for Temir, but they probably won't last longer than that, though.
Heat-protective gloves that are durable and protect against Burn damage.
These iron-lined yet agile wristbands act as excellent tools to block incoming attacksâ€¦ if one holds enough of the wolf's soul within.
Normal shoes. Nothing noteworthy about them except for how comfortable they are.
An old pair of rugged boots. They've seen some use but should protect your toes.
Even thicker boots offering more toe protection. A solid kick from these would probably hurt.
A pair of armored boots made of underground mutant bones and hide.
Boots reinforced with metal plating, balanced for good blood flow to your feet. It's going to take massive damage to get through these.
Lightweight experimental boots that deliver stability and comfort. They pinch the ankle slightly, however.
A pair of form-fitting, strangely nice-looking boots. They're also incredibly tough and should easily deflect almost anything that hits them.
The work shoes that miners wear. Not as comfortable as camp shoes.
These finely crafted boots make the wearer lighter on their feet, keeping them safe to continue the path of the wolf.
Goggles that protect the eyes. Other gear will be needed for the rest of the head.
Improved gloves that restores a bit of health with each successful attack. A gift for being a matchmaker.
A true warrior doesn't need a helmet. Wearing only a headband reveals one's inner strength to one's enemies.
Pierre's prototype extends the wearer's senses, ensuring nothing escapes notice. It's wonderful for reconnaissance but doesn't make for great armor.
A set of electrified gloves that speeds up attacks and makes it easier to slip in a surprise attack against an enemy.
These boots might not look like much, but they've survived every hazardous terrain on Earth. Now's the chance to wear them on a whole new world.
When wielding a melee weapon, this glove's combat AI increases the wearer's <#66FFCC>Accuracy</color> and reduces <#66FFCC>Fumble Chance</color>.
When firing a pistol or rifle, this scope provides helpful AI targeting that greatly increases <#66FFCC>Accuracy</color> and <#66FFCC>Ranged Critical Efficiency</color>.
Injecting yourself with the Dermal Shield solution changes the skin's chemistry to increase resistance to <#66FFCC>Acid Damage</color>.
In addition to being extremely fashionable, this stylish accessory increases resistance to <#FF0000>Burn Damage</color>.
This gas mask straps to a person's face and protects them from airborne toxins (increases resistance to <#FF0000>Poison Damage</color>).
Installed in an armor's chest, this miniature reactor enhances the wearer's <#66FFCC>Fortitude</color> (increases resistance to all adverse status effects).
When this grenade explodes next to an enemy, it covers them in thick webbing that halts all movement for 3 turns.
When placed around the eyes, this visor lets the wearer burn their enemies by shooting lasers from their frickin' face! Requires <#66FFCC>Nano Energy</color> to activate.
When worn around the mouth, this mask lets the wearer spit poison at their enemies to weaken them. Requires <#66FFCC>Nano Energy</color> to activate.
While wearing this mask, one can spit a chemical acid at nearby enemies. Requires <#66FFCC>Nano Energy</color> to activate.
Using advanced technology, this accessory collects particles from the environment to fire ultra-dense projectiles. Requires <#66FFCC>Nano Energy</color> to activate.
An Omniscope upgrade installed in one's armor to enhance damage dealt to undamaged enemies.
A basic lamp used to illuminate one's path within a very limited range.
A better lamp that lights up a wider area while underground.
With technology patented by TECC, this is the best lamp to illuminate a large area using simple batteries.
A container of portable oxygen designed for use in oxygen-poor areas for a short duration. Canisters cannot be refilled once depleted.
An improved-capacity container for portable oxygen designed for use in oxygen-poor areas for a short duration. Canisters cannot be refilled once depleted.
An advanced-capacity container of portable oxygen designed for use in oxygen-poor areas for a short duration. Canisters cannot be refilled once depleted.
A standard pickaxe used by miners. Keeping this in hand should make mining more efficient.
Made from higher-density iron, this is a step up from the basic pickaxe.
The best pickaxe around, crafted from forged titanium with a grip designed to survive the most brutal swings.
This one-of-a-kind pickaxe uses science to maximize mineral extraction output, but it should only be used to mine the rarest ore.
Some old hooked blade that was improvised into a tool. Should help harvest more materials.
An actual harvesting tool to dig plants up from the root more effectively. Go get some plants!
A sturdy handle with a sharp blade. Until they invent something new, this is the best harvesting tool around.
This one-of-a-kind scythe possesses the thinnest, sharpest blade to harvest the most delicate plant samples. It should only be used when other scythes don't work.
The first iteration of the Ward Belt. It looks a bit unfinished. Module Slots: 1.
An upgraded Ward Belt that fits better and adds versatility. Module Slots: 2.
A sleek belt that goes with any outfit, especially when utilizing multiple Nano Modules. Module Slots: 3.
Get the maximum use of Nano Modules from this belt made purely from advanced tech. Lots of wires and buttons. Module Slots: 4.
A simple module that concentrates Nano Energy to enhance the human body. It could be better, but you can't knock the results, either.
When installed, this module even further enhances your Attributes. It makes everything easier, but don't become dependent on it.
How this more refined module works is a mystery, but you can't deny that it makes you stronger, tougher, more agile, and more perceptive.
Installing this module makes you feel like a superhero. Your enemies better watch out.
A simple module that slightly reduces one's Needs and increases resistance against Status Effects. It helps, but it's not life-changing.
When installed, this module raises your survival chances and pushes you beyond normal human limits. It's pretty too!
Your body can adapt to any situation with the help of this refined module. Are there any limits to the power of Nano Energy?
Installing this module alters your physiology to superhuman levels. Enemies barely cause lasting damage, and your natural Needs are negligible.
Do you need a boost? This simple module enhances Nano abilities slightly, which might give you an edge in the mines.
Contamination is everywhere! This module delivers concentrated Nano Energy to increase control over Mutation and resist Nano Infection.
A refined module that pumps Nano Energy directly into your veins. The human body has its limits, however, so be careful.
Install this advanced module and see what it feels like to be a wizard of Nano powers. You don't even need a magic wand.
With this simple module, Special ability effects are slightly enhanced. Not by a lot, but even a little helps.
This module boosts the power of Special abilities, which can be the difference between life and death in the mines.
Installing this module sends bursts of Nano Energy pouring into the body, making everything you do... better. Get one now!
An advanced module capable of pushing your Special abilities beyond their limits. Shoot further, cut deeper, move faster!
